snippet.title: Avadon: The Black Fortress Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the trailer for Avadon: The Black Fortress, an indie epic fantasy role-playing adventure by Spiderweb Software for Windows, Macintosh, iPad, Linux, and Android.

To learn more about Avadon and download a big, free demo, go to

http://www.spiderwebsoftware.com/avadon/index.html
